mapper.sql: id, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, state_code, contacts, company_name, contact_number, contact_phone, address_first, address_second, address_thirdly, pid, pname, cid, cname, zip_code, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.warehouse_code,t.warehouse_name,t.contacts,t.company_name,t.contact_number,t.contact_phone,t.address_first,t.address_second,t.address_thirdly,t.zip_code,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time,t.area_group,t.country_code,t.country_name,t.state_code,t.state_name,t.city_code,t.city_name,t.region_code,t.region_name from fab_warehouse t where 1=1
AND t.warehouse_code LIKE concat('%',#{form.warehouseCode},'%')
AND t.warehouse_name LIKE concat('%',#{form.warehouseName},'%')
AND t.area_group LIKE concat('%',#{form.areaGroup},'%')
AND t.id not in
#{item}

select t.id,t.warehouse_code,t.warehouse_name,t.contacts,t.company_name,t.contact_number,t.contact_phone,t.address_first,t.address_second,t.address_thirdly,t.zip_code,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time,t.area_group,t.country_code,t.country_name,t.state_code,t.state_name,t.city_code,t.city_name,t.region_code,t.region_name from fab_warehouse t where t.warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode}
